Package de.clusterfreak.ClusterCore

Class PossibilisticCMeans

java.lang.Object
de.clusterfreak.ClusterCore.PossibilisticCMeans
public class PossibilisticCMeans extends Object
Possivilistic-C-Means (PCM)

Cluster analysis with Possivilistic-C-Means clustering algorithm 

 Step 1: Initialization
 Step 2: Determination of the cluster centers
 Step 3: Calculate the new partition matrix and ni
 Step 4: Termination or repetition
 Step 5: optional - Repeat calculation (steps 2 to 4)
Version:
1.2.3 (2020-11-01)
Author:
Thomas Heym
See Also:
FuzzyCMeans

    • PossibilisticCMeans

      public PossibilisticCMeans​(double[][] object, int clusterCount, int repeat, double e)
      Generates PCM-Object from a set of Points
      Parameters:
      object - Objects
      clusterCount - Number of clusters
      repeat - Number of PCM passes for determination of the cluster centers
      e - Termination threshold, initial value 1.0e-7
      See Also:
      FuzzyCMeans

  • Method Details

    • determineClusterCenters

      public double[][] determineClusterCenters​(boolean random, boolean returnPath)
      Returns the cluster centers
      Parameters:
      random - random initialization
      returnPath - Determines whether return the complete search path. Values: true, false
      Returns:
      Cluster centers and serarch path (optional); The cluster centers are at the end.
